filters

Class PublicationFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • filters.AdvancedFilters
      • filters.PublicationFilters

  • public class PublicationFilters
extends AdvancedFilters
    PublicationFilters is a VBox which is placed on the Search page. It contains various filter options for conducting a recording search, such as author and name.
    Author:
    Jack

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PublicationFilters(Database db, SearchDataView sc)
      Create the VBox which will contain the filters for a publication search
